text: Welcome to the peaceful Creekside community of Gisela. This charming manufactured home, built in 2000, spans 2,128 square feet of comfortable living space and sits on a little over half an acre of land, offering plenty of room for your horses, recreational vehicles, or RVs. With its generous layout and rural charm, this property invites you to enjoy both wide-open space and the soothing beauty of the surrounding countryside. Whether you envision a personal retreat, an equestrian escape, or a base for your outdoor adventures, this home delivers the perfect blend. Inside, the home offers spacious living areas, large windows that capture natural light, and comfortable design features that make it easy to relax or entertain. While the outdoor areas provide room for gardens, corrals, and gatherings. The land's flat terrain makes it ideal for expansion. Outdoor enthusiasts will find endless opportunities nearby: fishing, hiking, horseback riding, and exploring the forest trails that weave through the Tonto National Forest. Tonto Creek The Heartbeat of Gisela Just a short stroll from the property. The nearby Tonto Creek meanders gracefully through the valley, a living ribbon of clear, cool water that reflects the changing light and nourishes the surrounding landscape. Its gentle current brings a soothing energy to the area, inviting quiet walks, fishing, or simply moments of stillness beside the water. The creek's timeless presence defines life in Gisela peaceful, grounding, and deeply connected to nature. This natural gem is more than just a scenic backdrop it's the lifeblood of the area. Locals come to fish for trout, wade in the shallows, or simply sit beneath the cottonwoods. The creek nourishes the land, invites wildlife, and offers a refreshing escape during the warm summer months. Deer, birds, and other native species frequent its banks. For homeowners, the proximity to Tonto Creek means endless opportunity picnics by the water, walks beneath the shade of towering trees, and quiet moments where the world slows down. Whether you're watching your horses graze nearby, simply enjoying the beauty of your surroundings, the creek adds a magical quality to life here one that captures the essence of Gisela itself: peaceful, pure, and timeless. (Includes the 2 parcels next door) Totaling 0.52 Acres. This transaction includes parcel #: 304-33-129E
formatted_address: 571 S Tonto Creek Dr, Payson, AZ, 85541

text: Creekside Grandeur in Beaver Valley. Discover a rare gem on the water - a private retreat at the end of the road in the secluded hamlet of Beaver Valley. This remarkable home combines unmatched privacy, sturdy craftsmanship, and the serene beauty of the East Verde River. Built with 8x8x16 split-face block construction, a metal roof, and metal soffits, fascia, and beams, this home is exceptionally fire-resistant and built to last. Elevated about 25 feet above the river, it remains safely protected from seasonal high waters while offering stunning water views. Step inside to an immense great room featuring a south-facing wall of windows that flood the space with light and frame breathtaking river views. There's room for the entire family to relax and enjoy the peaceful surroundings. The lower level offers flexible living options perfect as a guest suite with a third bedroom, as well as a game room, fourth bedroom, or additional gathering space with its own private entrance and access to the covered patio below. Creature comforts for this year round property are a heat pump, with 'On Demand' hot water, wood burning fireplace with a blower fan, and easy draining of water for winterizing and safety. Enjoy the outdoors from the full-length Trex deck off the main floor, or from the shaded patio below. Listen to the gentle sounds of the river and savor the quiet solitude of the Tonto National Forest, which lies just across the street. Hike, explore forest service roads, or watch the abundant wildlife all right from your doorstep. This is more than a home it's a solid, enduring sanctuary in harmony with its natural surroundings, offering both protection from the elements and the soft charm of a riverfront lifestyle.
formatted_address: 989 W Verde Rd, Payson, AZ, 85541

text: Welcome to your Private Horse Ranch Retreat in the Heart of Payson, Arizona. Tucked away on 2.71 acres of pristine land, your new horse property is more than just a home - it's a lifestyle. Your secluded slice of heaven is fully fenced, cross-fenced, and thoughtfully set up for both horses and cows. Whether you're a full-time rancher, hobby farmer, or outdoor lover looking for space to roam, this place has you covered. Set up new ranch home features a beautiful covered porch, four bedrooms, and 2.75 bathrooms, including a private guest suite setup perfect for multi-generational living, visitors, or a rental opportunity - all under one roof. And not just any roof: your 50-year metal roof is designed to look like beautiful tile shingles, offering both durability and curb appeal. Your high quality, custom FCP barn is the envy of many! It is beautifully crafted and designed to make ranch life easy and accessible. You can pull a trailer of hay right inside and feed right off it. No more moving heavy bales over to the barn from hay storage. There's plenty of room to park a truck and trailer inside too! Either way, it's ready for your animals to move right in. And when you're done riding, enjoy time under the shade of all the beautiful trees on your property or gather fresh eggs from your chicken coop, or simply soak up the peaceful mountain air. Additional equestrian features include a classic shed row barn with individual run-outs, a round pen, and multiple sheds for feed, tools, and tack. You'll also find a 3-car garage and a 2-car garage perfect for storing your truck, trailer, toys, or farm equipment. Bonus? There's an indoor dog kennel setup for puppies, sick dogs, or those that just need a cozy outdoor haven. This property offers true privacy, with few neighbors in sight just you, the elk, deer, and abundant wildlife that wander through. Whether you're working the land or simply enjoying the quiet, it's a dream come true for anyone craving a rural escape with all the right amenities. Welcome home to Payson where nature, freedom, and country living meet. Easy to see with a few hours advanced notice.

text: Introducing a stunning new construction opportunity in the prestigious Chaparral Pines Golf Community, perfectly positioned on a premium lot overlooking the picturesque par-3 4th hole with its shimmering lake and waterfall views. Use the private elevator to go between the Main Level & Lower Level Suite. - Bright and Open: The home is filled with natural light and features an open living room concept with mountain views, perfect for relaxing in a private mountain retreat. - Multiple Fireplaces: The home features four fireplaces, providing a warm and cozy atmosphere. - Gourmet Kitchen: The kitchen is equipped with high-end appliances, ideal for culinary enthusiasts. Treat yourself to double ovens, gas stove, large granite island and a separate chef's pre-prep island complete with a second sink. - Spectacular Views: The property offers views of The Mogollon, Diamond Point and Stewart Mountains, an area known for rockhounding quartz crystals, and the Mogollon Rim, a dramatic 200-mile escarpment. - Outdoor Living: Spacious decks extend the living space and provide a place to enjoy the surrounding scenery and mountain air. Both decks feature expansive mountain views, great for outdoor entertaining. - Plenty of Parking: A 2.5-car garage offers ample space for two vehicles, golf cart and storage. - Additional Home Safety Features: In-house Fire Suppression System & hard-wired Alarm System Location Highlights: - The home is conveniently located for golf lovers, with access to both Chaparral Pines and The Rim Golf Club. - The property is a perfect base for exploring the surrounding Rim Country, known for its scenic hiking, fishing, and boating opportunities. - The high-elevation location provides a refreshing escape from the Arizona desert heat and cooler, seasonal weather.
